text: Sajib (Popularly known as Master Sajib) is a Bangladeshi film and television actor. He won Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Child Artist for the film Surja Dighal Bari (1979) share with Elora Gohor. ==Selected films== * Ovagi (1975) * Surja Dighal Bari (1979) * Gangchil (1980) ==Awards and nominations== National Film Awards {| border="1" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%;" |- style="background:#ccc; text-align:center;" ! Year !! Award !! Category !! Film !!
